segments.text: Oh no, that sink is overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's cascading down the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, unaware, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle; she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing for cookies on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretched out, the stool tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, so excited, but it's risky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's watching them; the adult's too absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, but inside it's chaos brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
